modName: Buy a new Decoration for your house
summary:
Now, in the Whiterun steward dialogue there are two new improvements to the house: \"Mannequins for the living room\" and \"Enchanting laboratory\".
In addition to user-friendly names, there are a few extras. Costs of improvements are standard.
descriptionHtml:
[color=green][b]Description:[/b][/color]
Opportunity to purchase several improvements for Breezehome from Whiterun steward. Added two topics in the dialogue of the decoration purchase:
[color=yellow][b]- Mannequins for the living room[/b][/color]
Two Mannequins, 9 weapon racks.
[color=yellow][b]- Enchanting Laboratory[/b][/color]
A table next to the enchanting alchemy. Above the table - the holder of a shield with two swords.
Next to the alchemical table - two racks for blades. In addition, in the same room
have another chest and a safe for jewelry. Safe deposit box is closed, the key is lost. You need to hack it.
There is a little surprise in the safe.

New additions are described in a book Home Decorating Guide.

Along the way, corrected lighting in the house, removed the shade in the form of a \"comb\" - see screenshots.

A few small details of the situation is altered, nothing significant (table cleared near the alchemy lab, there were books and a pitcher).

[color=green][b]Requirements:[/b][/color]
Game Version 1.5. To dialogue with the manager became available, it is necessary to pass the first jarl Balgruf quest.

Tested on patch 1.5.26.05. Everything is working fine.
You may download this mod in English and Russian version.

[color=green][b]Installation:[/b][/color]
Normal. The contents of the archive to unpack in a folder with the game. Plug in the launcher shMannequinDecorate_WBh.esp.

[color=green][b]The comments and additions:[/b][/color]
To avoid problems with the mannequins, I recommend to use the mannequins script fix.
Purchase Enchanting laboratory should do after buying an Alchemical laboratory (due to the fact that the wall separating the lab from the living room and kitchen is set after the payment of an alchemical laboratory). Also, it is best to buy mannequins after the purchase of furniture for the living room 1st floor for a similar reason.

[size=5][b][color=yellow]Mods are fueled by comments/endorsements.
So, please, leave a comments at least.[/color][/b][/size].
author: Shadowmann
